description:
This dashboard provides an overview of your [IBM Spectrum LSF](https://www.ibm.com/products/hpc-workload-management) environment.
It focuses on overall cluster performance, real time job information, and GPU information.
title: IBM Spectrum LSF Overview

definition.content:
This dashboard provides an overview of your [IBM Spectrum LSF](https://www.ibm.com/products/hpc-workload-management) environment.
It focuses on overall cluster performance, real time job information, and GPU information.

**Useful links**

* [Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/ibm_spectrum_lsf)
* [IBM Spectrum LSF Docs](https://www.ibm.com/products/hpc-workload-management)
*  [IBM Spectrum LSF Performance Monitoring Docs](https://www.ibm.com/docs/hr/spectrum-lsf/10.1.0?topic=performance-monitor-metrics-in-real-time)

definition.title: Number of jobs in each state per server
Average time from submission to completion
Time spent in each state per job
Number of jobs in each state in each queue
